plot: The life of an ambitious young writer changes forever after she meets a ballet dancer who lost her vision in a tragic accident, but still continues to dance.
title: Awaking
plot_es: The life of an ambitious young writer changes forever after she meets a ballet dancer who lost her vision in a tragic accident, but still continues to dance.
plot_en: The life of an ambitious young writer changes forever after she meets a ballet dancer who lost her vision in a tragic accident, but still continues to dance.
